text: Szymon Krawczyk (born 8 August 1998) is a Polish racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . He rode in the men's team pursuit event at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships.Start list ==Major results== ;2015 : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships : 1st 20px Team pursuit, National Track Championships : UEC European Junior Track Championships ::2nd 15px Points race ::3rd 15px Team pursuit : 3rd Overall La Coupe du Président de la Ville de Grudziądz ::1st Young rider classification ;2016 : UEC European Junior Track Championships ::1st 15px Omnium ::2nd 15px Team pursuit : 1st 20px Points race, UCI Junior Track World Championships : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships : 2nd Overall La Coupe du Président de la Ville de Grudziądz ;2017 : National Track Championships ::2nd Madison ::2nd Points race ::3rd Individual pursuit ::3rd Omnium : 3rd 15px Team pursuit, UEC European Under-23 Track Championships ;2018 : National Track Championships ::1st 20px Madison (with Damian Sławek) ::1st 20px Individual pursuit ::2nd Scratch : 3rd 15px Elimination race, UEC European Track Championships ;2019 : 2nd Scratch, National Track Championships : 6th GP Slovakia : 10th Overall Dookola Mazowsza ;2020 : 1st 20px Time trial, National U23 Road Championships : 1st Stage 2 Giro del Friuli-Venezia Giulia : 3rd Overall Tour of Romania ::1st 20px Young rider classification : 5th Overall Dookoła Mazowsza : 6th Overall Tour of Szeklerland : National Road Championships ::6th Time trial ::7th Road race ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:European Games competitors for Poland Category:Cyclists at the 2019 European Games Category:People from Jarocin
title: Szymon Krawczyk
